name: Notion Note-Taking Template
description: I like to think of my note-taking system as having a "backend" consisting of notebooks that cover all aspects of my personal life, and a "frontend" that I interact with on a daily basisThis setup basically allows me to not only record notes productively and efficiently, but also helps me resurface relevant notes when the situation calls for itGo ahead, give it a try!Check out my full Notion course: Build Your Command Center in Notion.
